footer.info: Copyright {year} Artur Åšcibor. All rights reserved.

banner.h2: This is my next project, built for daily work and self-realization. This project is used to record my daily results, especially during long-term challenges or goals. Currently, there is one project that documents my transformation over 150 days.
banner.h3: What was the purpose of building this project?
banner.h4: I created a program that calculates statistics from week to week based on my daily data and results. I thought it would be nice to create a basic project that would make things easier for me and that I could expand and improve at any time. The project is available to many people who can record their progress. To gain access, you need to contact me. I also consider this project as another addition to my portfolio.
banner.h5: What tools were used to build the project:
banner.p: Thank you for reaching this point. I assume that the project does not have a 'wow' factor, but that was its goal. It is a project built on powerful tools that have been used here. The visual layer was not designed from scratch but rather partially modeled on another site.

createProject.title: Create Project
createProject.description: If you want to create a project in three languages, you need to add the project separately each time. So you create it in Polish, then English and German versions. If you add only one version, it will not appear after changing the language.
